descriptionHtml:
[center][b][url=http://xeniusmods.tumblr.com/]Follow my blog on Tumblr for the latest news on upcoming releases, progress reports, beta releases, and more![/url][/b][/center]

[center]
[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322939863.png[/img]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356][img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/2356-1-1323432138.jpg[/img][/url]
[/center][img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753681.png[/img]

This mod gets rid of the blocky faces, caused by compression artifacts on the normal maps.
These normal maps have been smoothed and saved using a lossless format.

It affects all characters of the following races:

Imperial
Nord
Breton
Redguard
Dark Elf
High Elf
Wood Elf
Orc

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753729.png[/img]

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

You can find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

To those who are new to using Elder Scrolls mods:

- You do not have to extract the .bsa archives. The folder provided by
 this mod has the same structure as the inside of the .bsa archive, it will
 override the textures that are included in the .bsa file.
- Do not worry about the Data folder that already exists, the folder provided
by this mod will be merged with the existing folder, it will not be overwritten.

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753784.png[/img]

Remove the following files:

Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\darkelffemale\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\darkelfmale\\malehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\femaleorc\\femaleheadorc_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\highelffemale\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\highelfmale\\malehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\imperialfemale\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\imperialmale\\malehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\orcmale\\maleheadorc_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\redguardfemale\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\redguardmale\\malehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\woodelfmale\\malehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\astridhead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\femaleold\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\male\\malehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\maleold\\malehead_msn.dds

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753839.png[/img]

The following mods are all compatible with each other:

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26]Detailed Faces[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=256]Detailed Bodies[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=689]Detailed Lips[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30]No More Blocky Faces[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=498]High Quality Eyes[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=944]Better Beast Races[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4489]Weathered Warpaint and Improved Dirt[/url]

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753874.png[/img]

[11-11-11] 1.0 Release
[11-11-11] 1.1 Update - Added remaining faces
[12-11-11] 1.2 Update - More Blockyness removed
[13-11-11] 1.3 Update - Optimized version
[13-11-11] Added optional update which merges this mod with arlekin\'s \"Less Ugly Elven Faces\"
[02-12-11] 1.4 Update - Smoothed remaining blocky parts (foreheads, cheeks)
[08-12-11] Added optional smooth Dunmer file
[25-12-11] 1.5 Update - Smoothed back of the heads

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753911.png[/img]

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
Thanks to [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=132982]arlekin[/url] for [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=29]Less Ugly Elven Faces[/url]

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753946.png[/img]

The content of this mod is open source and can be used freely on the following conditions:

- Credit me
- Notify me
- Skyrim only
author: Xenius
